### assignAbbrev() {#ga2aa92c4a933559ff31416fbf591a2ebb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::DWARFLinker::assignAbbrev (DIEAbbrev &amp; Abbrev)</>}>
Assign an abbreviation number to <code>Abbrev</code>.

Our DIEs get freed after every DebugMapObject has been processed, thus the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/foldingset">FoldingSet</a> we use to unique DIEAbbrevs cannot refer to the instances hold by the DIEs. When we encounter an abbreviation that we don&#39;t know, we create a permanent copy of it.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/include/llvm/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinker-h/#l00724">724</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwarflinker/include/llvm/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinker-h">DWARFLinker.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinker-cpp/#l01010">1010</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/classic/dwarflinker-cpp">DWARFLinker.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### emitAcceleratorEntriesForUnit() {#ga54dda4f7a2eefd155f9b950467deeb3e}

<MemberDefinition

### patchFrameInfoForObject() {#gaedf18a2dd597536e4fcc81f0c746cef0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::DWARFLinker::patchFrameInfoForObject (LinkContext &amp; Context)</>}>
Patch the frame info for an object file and emit it.

Read the frame info stored in the object, and emit the patched frame descriptions for the resulting file.

This is actually pretty easy as the data of the CIEs and FDEs can be considered as black boxes and moved as is. The only thing to do is to patch the addresses in the headers.

## Variables

### Abbreviations {#ga28295e4595aa2e9795bafb4f988eb387}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::vector&lt;std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;DIEAbbrev&gt; &gt; llvm::dwarf&#95;linker::classic::DWARFLinker::Abbreviations</>}>
Storage for the unique Abbreviations.

This is passed to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#aa1be0c2d757c08ab5a681f4cf1c675aa">AsmPrinter::emitDwarfAbbrevs()</a>, thus it cannot be changed to a vector of unique&#95;ptrs.
